message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to kick off the negotiations at $18,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counter offer, but $18,000 is firm. I know this product can bring a lot of value and I wouldn't want to undervalue it.  Is there any flexibility in your budget?
